function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher ion densities achieved in poultry studies may not be applicable to healthcare environments, reducing the effectiveness of ionizers in preventing TB transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of TB transmission due to reduced effectiveness of ionizers.","Mitigation":"Conduct further studies to understand ionizer effectiveness in healthcare environments and implement alternative measures to prevent TB transmission.","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV light air sterilization, positive air pressure systems.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors.","Owner":"Medical facilities, researchers."},{"Description":"Accumulation of potentially infectious particles onto adjacent surfaces or grounded parts of the ionizer, leading to localized outbreak of TB-infected animals and potential risk of transmission to humans.","Impact":"Increased risk of localized TB outbreaks and potential transmission to humans.","Mitigation":"Implement localized grounded collecting plates and regular cleaning and maintenance of ionizers.","Technologies":"Localized grounded collecting plates, ionizer cleaning and maintenance protocols.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors.","Owner":"Medical facilities, researchers."},{"Description":"Static charge interference with medical equipment due to ionizers, potentially leading to malfunctions or hazards in medical equipment.","Impact":"Risk of medical equipment malfunctions or hazards, impacting patient care and safety.","Mitigation":"Monitor and evaluate the impact of ionizers on medical equipment, and implement alternative technologies or grounding methods to mitigate static charge interference.","Technologies":"Grounding methods, alternative technologies to ionizers.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, biomedical engineers.","Owner":"Medical facilities, biomedical engineering departments."}]}
